title: Designing Academic Thriving Through Online Science Inquiry Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Focused on elementary science education for working professionals, enhancing social interaction for scientific inquiry and academic growth

learning_goals: Learners actively participate at least three times in scientific discussions with peers using online collaboration tools
Learners specify at least two academic growth elements (motivation, engagement, relationships) when writing weekly reflective journals
Learners propose solutions to real-world problems through science inquiry projects designed in blended learning environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
